A user group for Ruby and Rails enthusiasts.

Join Our Google Groups

Meeting Announcements & Reminders

Join the Iowa Ruby Brigade Google Group to receive monthly announcements and reminders of each meeting.

Subscribe to Iowa Ruby Brigade

Email:

Visit this group

This is an announcement-only group with low volume.  We try to limit it to two messages per month: a meeting announcement, and a meeting reminder.

Discussion

We also have a Google Group that serves as a discussion forum.

Subscribe to Iowa Ruby Brigade Talk

Email:

Visit this group

This is a discussion forum.  Please use it to discuss topics of interest to the user group.

Everyone is encouraged to join both groups!
